prompt: Create a vibrant product categories page with a bright yellow background and a centered app bar displaying 'Categories' in bold white text with a black shadow. Use a 2-column grid layout to showcase 6 product categories, each in a rectangular card with sharp corners and a white background. Each card should have a centered orange icon (shopping bag, headphones, laptop, shirt, book, home) and the category name (Electronics, Audio, Computers, Fashion, Books, Home) in black below it. Add bold shadows to the cards and minimal padding for a bold, energetic design.
